summary:
"The Simpsons" is an American animated TV show created by Matt Groening. It's about the Simpson family—Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa, and Maggie—living in the fake town of Springfield. The show makes fun of American life and culture. It started in 1987 as shorts on "The Tracey Ullman Show" and became its own show in 1989.

It's the longest-running U.S. animated series and sitcom, with over 770 episodes. There's also a successful movie. "The Simpsons" has won lots of awards and is super famous. Many people think the early seasons were the best.
title: The Simpsons
